recommendations: Rajat Chowdhary ‚ÄúNikila is an outstanding human resources professional, who deftly balances the interests of the employee with those of her company. She has proven to be an excellent mentor, career coach and exhibits masterly of her HR domain and is extremely articulate in both her written and verbal communications. Nikila is able to communicate genuine empathy with each individual that comes is in contact with her. I have observed Nikila 's ability to motivate her own team by providing excellent leadership especially when confronted with tough uncomfortable situations that HR professionals always need to be adept at handling. On many occasions when faced with a severe talent crunch, I have counted on Nikila to help us get connected with the best engineering talent. Its Nikila's uncanny ability to find needle in a haystack that has seen us through those times. I wish Nikila all the best in her future endeavors and would always vouch for her professionalism and commitment to work. ‚Äù

Rani Kashyap ‚ÄúGreat to work with Nikila Belle,few of the very accessible and knowledgeable Recruiters I have met. She is very detail-oriented & focused towards her work & goals, Knows very well, what is expected out of her and has produced great results for the company. Her domain knowledge is excellent which is must be in her field. I wish her luck in her current and future endeavors.‚Äù
